title: Revenues of Italian company Guccio Gucci in 2011 to 2018
summary: Italian Gucci Italian is a luxury Italian fashion house founded in a small town cose to Milan in 1985 by the two Italian designers Domenico Italian and Stefano Italian .
This timeline illustrates the turrnover of the Italian luxury fashion company Italian Gucci between 2011 and 2018 .
In 2018 , the total Revenues of Italian Gucci amounted to over 267.63 million euros , a decrease compared to the previous Year .
